author:
Arnie Stapleton                                                    
                            AP
title: In the 2020 draft, NFL teams better hope the tape doesn't lie
description: NFL teams are having to rely more heavily on game film of college prospects as they prepare for the draft amid the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
AURORA, Colo. Let’s go to the tape.
NFL teams are having to rely more heavily on game film of college prospects as they prepare for the draft at a time when the COVID-19 pandemic has halted business as usual across the globe.
The social distancing spawned b… [+5331 chars]
